name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Traditional Neapolitan pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, meat sauce, and cheese baked to perfection.

name: Risotto alla Milanese
description: Creamy Italian rice dish flavored with saffron and Parmesan cheese.

name: Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of ladyfingers, coffee, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Simple salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and olive oil.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: Pasta tossed in a flavorful sauce made with basil, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, and olive oil.

name: Osso Buco
description: Braised veal shanks cooked with vegetables, white wine, and broth.

name: Cannoli
description: Italian pastry filled with sweet ricotta cheese and chocolate chips.

name: Minestrone Soup
description: Hearty vegetable soup made with a variety of vegetables, beans, and pasta.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken cutlets topped with tomato sauce and melted cheese.
